div.p: You can also view these steps by category .

li.p: p:insert - Insert a piece of content in another
p:insert - Insert a piece of content in another
p:insert - Insert a piece of content in another
p:insert - Insert a piece of content in another

div.p: Insert a piece of content in another
The p:insert step inserts the insertion port's document into the [*** Unrecognized element: <db:port> (phase: inline)] port's document relative to the matching elements in the source port's document.

The value of the [*** Unrecognized element: <db:option> (phase: inline)] option [*** Unrecognized element: <db:rfc2119> (phase: inline)] be an XSLTSelectionPattern. [*** Unrecognized element: <db:error code="C0023"> (phase: inline)] Multiple matches are allowed, in which case multiple copies of the [*** Unrecognized element: <db:port> (phase: inline)] documents will occur. If no elements match, then the document is unchanged.
The value of the [*** Unrecognized element: <db:option> (phase: inline)] option [*** Unrecognized element: <db:rfc2119> (phase: inline)] be an NMTOKEN in the following list:

li.p: “first-child” - the insertion is made as the first child of the match;
“last-child” - the insertion is made as the last child of the match;
“before” - the insertion is made as the immediate preceding sibling of the match;
“after” - the insertion is made as the immediate following sibling of the match.

div.p: As the inserted elements are part of the output of the step they are not considered in determining matching elements. If an empty sequence appears on the [*** Unrecognized element: <db:port> (phase: inline)] port, the result will be the same as the source.
The p:replace step replaces matching nodes in its primary input with the top-level node(s) of the replacement port's document.

The value of the [*** Unrecognized element: <db:option> (phase: inline)] option [*** Unrecognized element: <db:rfc2119> (phase: inline)] be an XSLTSelectionPattern. [*** Unrecognized element: <db:error code="C0023"> (phase: inline)] Multiple matches are allowed, in which case multiple copies of the [*** Unrecognized element: <db:port> (phase: inline)] document will occur.

Every node in the primary input matching the specified pattern is replaced in the output by the top-level node(s) of the [*** Unrecognized element: <db:port> (phase: inline)] document. Only non-nested matches are replaced. That is, once a node is replaced, its descendants cannot be matched.

If the document node is matched and port [*** Unrecognized element: <db:port> (phase: inline)] contains a text document, the entire document is replaced by the text node. What appears on port [*** Unrecognized element: <db:port> (phase: inline)] is a text document with the text node wrapped in a document node.
You can also view these steps by category .

Every node in the primary input matching the specified pattern is replaced in the output by the top-level node(s) of the [*** Unrecognized element: <db:port> (phase: inline)] document. Only non-nested matches are replaced. That is, once a node is replaced, its descendants cannot be matched.

If the document node is matched and port [*** Unrecognized element: <db:port> (phase: inline)] contains a text document, the entire document is replaced by the text node. What appears on port [*** Unrecognized element: <db:port> (phase: inline)] is a text document with the text node wrapped in a document node.
